items.title: „Individuell ist der österreichische Kader nicht so herausragend wie von den anderen verbliebenen Nationen, aber der Zusammenhalt und das Kollektiv sind die entscheidenden Faktoren für diese Ausnahmeleistung“

“A tourist levy would benefit the capital’s tourist economy, provided the revenues go to local government – ideally split between City Hall and the boroughs – and are not ring-fenced by central government for specific purposes,” “Hopefully, introducing a tourist levy is the start of a bigger programme of devolving tax and spending powers to the capital. London is the most productive big city in the UK, and devolving more fiscal powers would give the capital more policy tools to accelerate growth in the economy”
"Ireland is doing an excellent job in preparing for the reform of our migration and asylum policy. "

«Se tutti i paesi europei riducessero la quota di finanziamento pubblico destinata a sanità, istruzione, pensioni, infrastrutture e sicurezza energetica, portandola alla media Ocse, ciò potrebbe generare risparmi medi fino al tre per cento del pil»
